mapper.select: SELECT * FROM franchise f JOIN product p ON f.frcode = p.frcode WHERE f.frcode = #{frcode} ORDER BY f.frcode ASC, p.pdseq ASC
SELECT DISTINCT bname FROM product WHERE frcode = #{frcode}
SELECT DISTINCT mname, mkname FROM product WHERE frcode = #{frcode} AND bname = #{bname}

SELECT DISTINCT pdseq, frcode, bcode, bname, mcode, mname, mkname, pdcode, pdname, price, pduploadfile, pdurl, hashtag, mucode1, mucode2, mucode3, bestproduct, newproduct, seasonproduct FROM menu n JOIN product p ON n.mucode = p.mucode1 OR n.mucode = p.mucode2 OR n.mucode = p.mucode3 ORDER BY frcode ASC, pdseq ASC limit #{sno}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from product
